nodes.text: Tales of Villainy: The Crimson Corsair and the Crime Lords of the Barren Rim

"Tales of Villainy: The Crimson Corsair and the Crime Lords of the Barren Rim" is a comic story that was published as the secondary story of Star Wars Adventures 7. It was written by Landry Q. Walker, illustrated by Nick Brokenshire, and published by IDW Publishing on July 28, 2021.
